tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries set_library_permissions --library_id "$library_id"
#if $access_in --access_in "$access_in" #end if #if $modify_in --modify_in "$modify_in" #end if #if $add_in --add_in "$add_in" #end if #if $manage_in --manage_in "$manage_in" #end if
| jq -S . > $results
tool.help: Set the permissions for a library. Note: it will override all security for this library even if you leave out a permission type.
